Effect.en:
You can only use the following effect of "Trias Hierarchia" once per turn. During the Main Phase, if this card is in your hand or GY (Quick Effect): You can Tribute up to 3 Fairy monsters; Special Summon this card, but banish it when it leaves the field, then apply these effects, in sequence, depending on the number of monsters Tributed.
● 2+: Destroy 1 card your opponent controls.
● 3: Draw 2 cards.
